content: Created `examples/sample_run.json`, a fully valid worked-example benchmark run document (including pass/fail/error cases plus an aggregated summary) suitable for demonstrating successful schema validation.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path, PurePosixPath
base=Path("/mnt/data")
list(base.iterdir())[:20]

outputs.logs:
{'type': 'object',
 'additionalProperties': False,
 'required': ['case_id', 'status', 'metrics'],
 'properties': {'case_id': {'type': 'string', 'minLength': 1},
                'status': {'type': 'string',
                           'description': 'Outcome for this case.',
                           'enum': ['pass', 'fail', 'error', 'skip']},
                'metrics': {'type': 'object',
                            'description': 'Case-level metrics (scores, '
                                           'latencies, etc.).',
                            'additionalProperties': {'anyOf': [{'type': 'number'},
                                                               {'type': 'integer'},
                                                               {'type': 'string'},
                                                               {'type': 'boolean'},
                                                               {'type': 'null'}]}},
                'output': {'type': ['object', 'string', 'null'],
                           'description': 'Optional raw model output for the '
                                          'case.',
                           'additionalProperties': True},
                'error': {'type': 'object',
                          'description': 'Present when status=error.',
                          'additionalProperties': False,
                          'required': ['message'],
                          'properties': {'message': {'type': 'string'},
                                         'type': {'type': 'string'},
                                         'traceback': {'type': 'string'}}},
                'started_at': {'type': 'string', 'format': 'date-time'},
                'ended_at': {'type': 'string', 'format': 'date-time'}},
 'allOf': [{'if': {'properties': {'status': {'const': 'error'}}},
            'then': {'required': ['error']}}]}

{'type': 'object',
 'description': 'Benchmark configuration used for the run; intentionally '
                'open-ended.',
 'additionalProperties': True}

content.text: Created `examples/sample_run.json`, a fully valid worked-example benchmark run document (including pass/fail/error cases plus an aggregated summary) suitable for demonstrating successful schema validation.
